description: From solution to a difference equation.
comments: Binomial transform of A000557. - _Vladimir Reshetnikov_, Oct 29 2015
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: P. R. J. Asveld, A family of Fibonacci-like sequences, Fib. Quart., 25 (1987), 81-83.
formula: E.g.f.: exp(x)/(1-2*sinh(x)) - Sander Zwegers (s.zwegers(AT)hetnet.nl), Jun 28 2007E.g.f.: 1/( U(0) -1 ) where U(k)= 1 + 1/(2^k - 2*x*4^k/(2*x*2^k - (k+1)/U(k+1) ));(continued fraction 3rd kind, 3-step ). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Dec 05 2012
mathematica: Round@Table[Sum[Binomial[n, k] (-1)^k (PolyLog[-k, 1-GoldenRatio] - PolyLog[-k, GoldenRatio])/Sqrt[5] , {k, 0, n}], {n, 0, 20}] (* _Vladimir Reshetnikov_, Oct 29 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
